徛字的基本解释

徛
jì
石桥，放在水中用来渡水的石头。
站立。

徛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》居義切，去寘，見。］
(1)水流中可以用来过河的石头。一说石桥。
(2)立。

徛字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彳字部】　徛； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页368第14
【唐韻】去奇切【集韻】【韻會】丘奇切，?音崎。【說文】舉足以渡也。　又【廣韻】渠綺切，音技。立也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?居義切，音寄。【爾雅·釋宮】石杠謂之徛。【註】聚石水中，以爲步渡彴也。【廣雅】徛，步橋也。　【集韻】或作?。

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Niche
jì
Stone bridge, a stone placed in the water for crossing the water.
Stand up.
Niche
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Guangyun" Juyi cut, go to set, see. ]
(1) Stones in the water that can be used to cross the river. One talk about stone bridge.
(2) Standing.

[Yin Ji 2] [彳字部] 　徛; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 368-14
[Tang Yun] Go to Qiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Chu Qiqie, Otosaki. [Said the text] The act is enough to cross.　[Guang Yun] Qu Qiqie, sound skill. Li also.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Juyi cut, sound sent. 【Erya·Shigong】Stone bars are called niches. [Note] Ju Shi is in the water, thinking that it is also a step to cross. [Guang Ya] niche, step bridge also.　【Jiyun】or make?.
